word: H8159 - שָׁעָה - shâʻâh - shaw-aw' - Depart - புறப்பட்டுப்போ

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - பங்கலாகு, பொறுமைபாயிரு, திகை, அங்கிகரி, நோக்கு, விலக்கு, செவிகொடு, விடு, நோக்கமாயிரு,
to look at, to look to, to regard, to gaze at (or about)
a) (Qal) to gaze at, to regard, to behold, to look about
b) (Hiphil) to look away, to cause gaze to turn away
c) (Hithpael) to look in dismay, to gaze about (in anxiety)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to gaze at or about (properly for help); by implication to inspect, consider, compassionate, be nonplussed (as looking around in amazement) or bewildered: - depart, be dim, be dismayed, look (away), regard, have respect, spare, turn.
